document.full_text: the mets announced monday that third baseman david wright has a stress fracture in his back and could end up on the disabled list for several weeks while it heals.
document.title: mets' wright has stress fracture in his back
lines_and_colors: the mets announced monday that third baseman david wright has a stress fracture in his back and could end up on the disabled list for several weeks while it heals.
